split_by_visit

Source: R/Dataset_splitter.R
split_by_visit.Rd

split_by_visit

Usage

split_by_visit(
  dataset,
  ratios,
  seed = NULL,
  stratify = FALSE,
  stratify_by = NULL
)

Arguments

dataset

A SampleDataset object.

ratios

A numeric vector of length 3 indicating train/val/test split ratios. Must sum to 1.

seed

Optional integer for reproducibility.

stratify

Logical, whether to perform stratified sampling. Default: FALSE.

stratify_by

Character, the name of the field to stratify by (e.g., the label). Required if stratify is TRUE.

Value

A list of 3 torch::dataset_subset objects.

On this page
